creator: taskazan@metu.edu.tr
text:
Hi, we have used apache2.0.55 with the following options on AIX 5.2 since one
week ago.
"./configure" \
"--with-mpm=worker" \
"--without-berkeley-db" \
"--prefix=httpd-2.0.55" \
"--enable-module=so" \
"--enable-suexec" \
"--with-suexec-caller=httpd" \
"--with-suexec-docroot=htdocs" \
"--with-ldap" \
"--enable-ldap" \
"--enable-auth-ldap" \
"--enable-ssl" \
"--with-ssl=/usr/local"

In httpd.conf, we have the following configuration,
LDAPSharedCacheSize 200000
LDAPCacheEntries 512
LDAPCacheTTL 600
LDAPOpCacheEntries 1024
LDAPOpCacheTTL 600
LDAPTrustedCA /xxx/certs/cacrt.txt
LDAPTrustedCAType  BASE64_FILE

Before this installation we were using the same configuration without LDAP
options. At that time, Apache uses all tcp/ip sockets on the server in 1½ days.
and server can not use any sockets until we reboot the machine. The hit of the
server is ~4.000.000 in a day. 

When we are looking for the problem, we can not see any errors on error_log of
apache, system logs, error report of OS or network logs both for Input/Output. 

The only thing that is changed is compiling Apache2.0.55 with ldap. Can any body
 help us?

thanks

Feyza Eryol
taskazan at metu dot edu dot tr
